name: Mausoleum Raid 64
description:
Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look

Mouse Right - Shoot

Mouse Left - Granade

Press Enter during the death or victory screen to restart.

esc - quit game

+/- - changes mouse sesitivity

i - inverts mouse

Pixel Art - DasBilligeAlien

Coding & Level design - Direshrub
